name: Moonlight Boy
description:
Story

Immerse yourself in Moonlight Boy, a fantastic dark tale that will have you face your childhood fears! Help Edgar escape from a mysterious factory that enslaves zombies. Edgar, the first born zombie child, must face daunting puzzles and free the slaves from the Master's terrible dominion.

Gameplay

The game is a 2.5D platform, in which you need to solve puzzles to advance in the level. The entire narrative is spread across the level.
